attributes.additional_details:
Scottish MPs to be excluded on voting on matters that relate only to England if more devolution takes place.

To get a group of individuals to stand at the next General Election at all English constituencies as independents on the English only vote ticket.

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition Title: Exclusion of non-English MPs from English affairs

Created by: John Craib

Closing: 30/03/2015
